resources.string: You have to add people who could find you.
I would like to share Awesome app that helps to find your phone location
You need to give number of permissions to this app to find your phone locations when you miss it, please select remember always
This app need to access to your location and SMS to enable you to find your phone without internet

This app allows you to find your phone using other trusted phones, so you can select list of people who you want to allow them to find your phone, and list of people who you can find them, Also you could find you phone from any device that do not have this app by sending SMS contains your personal password to your phone. In this section you can choose people who can find your phone.
Find location is Denied, we cannot find your phone
s phone sent its location,If he select you in his list of who could find me, you will get his location in 10 sec
s phone sent emergency message with his location asking for your help. Click here for details
Please setup the trust number from setting
Please help me. I am here
See current location for list of phones that you track
See current location for list of phones that you track
Ask for help from your friends who you trust. The system will send them your current location with emergency message.
Ask for help from your friends who you trust. The system will send them your current location with emergency message.
Rate this App, your review is very important to us for enhancing app functionality.
Manage the people who could find you, and who you could find
requests your location. Click grant to add him/her in your trust list.
Hi, I Added you as person who could find me , you could find me use app
needs to add you to his/her trusted list. You will be able to track his/her phone.
By using this Password you could find your phone by send sms contain this code from any device

Do you want to tell him by SMS that you added his phone number in your app
%1$s! needs to add you to his/her trusted list. You will be able to track his/her phone. You will find his/her phone in your Tracking List
%1$s! needs to add you to his/her tracking list. He/She could track your phone. You will find his/her phone in your Trusted List
Write down full phone number without country code
Write down full phone number without country code and then write down your password
Send your saved password to your lost phone
You should write your stolen phone number & password to detect your mobile location
